body:
I don't see a reason why this should be private any more than any of the other functions and fields of the Impl classes. You should generally not access the impl classes directly, but it is inconvenient to mark them as private.

For this function, there is no difference if you call it on the impl or call the corresponding function on the Variable struct.

body_text:
I don't see a reason why this should be private any more than any of the other functions and fields of the Impl classes. You should generally not access the impl classes directly, but it is inconvenient to mark them as private.
For this function, there is no difference if you call it on the impl or call the corresponding function on the Variable struct.
